name: Escape the Dark Tower
description:
Step into a realm of mystery and magic with Escape the Dark Tower, a captivating escape room adventure with charming visuals.

Imprisoned within the sinister stronghold of a wizard, you must summon your wit and courage to conquer intricate puzzles and unlock the path to freedom.

Do you have what it takes to break free?

Features:
Escape the Dark Tower is an immersive escape room adventure with an intuitive point-and-click interface. It features 15 rooms filled with puzzles waiting to be explored and beautifully crafted pixel art graphics that guarantee an authentic retro gaming experience.

Escape the Dark Tower is the first published work of a solo developer.
It's a short game with an estimated play time of 40 minutes.
